Reviews.Title: Well worth the price
Reviews.Author: Cliffray2
Reviews.Content: I know that this TV costs more than your standard Flat Panel, but it is worth the extra money.  It really keeps up in the weather, picture quality is great, Sound is clear and it does not reflect the outdoor lighting.  I would recommend buying a cover and a lock for it.

ProductInfo.Features:
31.5-inch diagonal TFT active matrix LCD screen
1366 x 768 resolution
16:9 aspect ratio; 1500:1 contrast ratio
178 x 178 H/V viewing angle
8ms response time
ProductInfo.Name: SunBriteTV SB-3230HD All-Weather Outdoor 32-Inch 720p LCD HDTV, Gray
